item.title: 'I cant believe my baby is not going to be here' - mother of fire victim
item.description: Shelley Sykes' son Rory, who had cerebral palsy and struggled with mobility, chose to not to follow an evacuation order.

item.title: Oliviero Toscani, Benetton's shock photographer, dies aged 82
item.description: Toscani was the creative force behind shock ad campaigns of the 1990s including a priest and nun kissing.

item.title: Landslides kill at least 10 in Brazil's Minas Gerais state
item.description: The landslides were triggered by torrential rain which fell in the city in the early hours of Sunday.

item.title: AfD embraces mass deportation of migrants as German election nears
item.description: During a party conference Alice Weidel publicly endorsed the mass "return" or deportation of people with a migrant background.

item.title: Nigeria military kills 16 civilians in air strike 'mistake'
item.description: The villagers were reportedly returning from a mission to chase away armed groups when they were bombed.
